t:
Footsteps echo.
Turn around. Empty street.
Faster footsteps.
c:
Participate in the #rapidfire and come up with a #8wordhorrorstory. A story should have a beginning,  middle and an end.
#footsteps #street #follow #stalker or #ghost
My favourite entries posted before 10:15 pm IST will be highlighted. #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba

If you are good with words, you might like this: https://sherlockdoyle.github.io/antonemo/ (link also available in profile)
